body: 72 (return) [ Basilius C¾sariensis episcopus Cappadoci¾ clarus habetur... qui multa continenti¾ et ingenii bona uno superbi¾ malo perdidit. It does not appear in ScaligerÕs edition of his Chronicle; but Isaac Vossius found it in some old Mss. which had not been reformed by the monks.]
